name: Destiny of Ancient Kingdoms™
developer: Utopia Dream Entertainment Alliance (Pty) Ltd - South Africa
publisher: Utopia Dream Entertainment Alliance (Pty) Ltd - South Africa
description: Destiny of Ancient Kingdoms (DOAK) is a free, action MMORPG based on the legends of Norse Mythology. An epic story-line, action-packed combat and classic multiplayer roleplaying elements await strong warriors who are courageous enough to enter the New World!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Dual-core 2.0GHz CPU or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 or higher, GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X850 performance, 128MB+ video ram DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound chip or onboard audio capability with the latest sound drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz CPU equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon HD 2900GT performance or better, 512MB+ video ram DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound chip or onboard audio capability with the latest sound drivers

reviews.review_text: ok so this game is really grindy af.. it gets to the point where you just put it on auto and can sleep through the night (unless some tough guy pk's you) which i warn you, if you wanna play this game certain people in toue kingdom might kill you even if you're in the same kingdom! which makes no sense there are 3 different kingdoms and the 3rd one you cant get transferred to until you reach lvl 35 i believe and then again its prob not worth it to transfer there, anyways. for a lot of the content (that helps you level up exponentially) you're gunna need a group and if you wanna relax its gotta be balanced and so forth basic ♥♥♥♥ right. NO! cuz i swear every damn mofo in the server plays as either an archer or assassin. rarely will you see a friar (or a decent one) or a tank. in my experience anyways (ign :reaper529 guild: Fury if you're interested in joining we just levelled the guild so pm me we got spots for anyone in kingdom of magic) If anyone else has been having major server issues on and off please let me know too (also if you're just starting for someone that has referred put in my email:  kevinknoblock2@gmail.com)  i think it asks for email for referral lol

Ive played tons of different mmorpgs over the years and for a f2p mmorpg this game is pretty decent. Graphics are fine, combat and general movement is fluent and impactful, leveling isnt annoying, game is optimized and takes up very little resources, great ping and no disconnects or crashes on release day (now thats rare), a lot of classes (some standard classes like mage, archer, assassin but also some unique classes) and there seems to be a lot of content too. Daily Events, some sort of rebirth system, 7 crafting skills, tons of quests etc...  The only negative things so far is the limited character customization (you cant even zoom in to the face) and not being able to jump.  If youre bored with everything thats out right now (like me) and youre looking for something that doesnt annoy you and holds you over til something new comes out, you will probably like this.
found some old ♥♥♥♥ playing it, this game sucks  Dont play it if you hate vampires
It's a good game to kill time.Greate community,alwayts willing to help

This may very well be the worst mmorpg in existence.  No jump button you can run through most objects terrible controls terrible camera NO BAG SPACE! textures are...wait, there are no textures!    i would be amazed if the servers are up on January 1st, 2017/
Not to bad. Not to great. Game looks old but seems to have a few people playing mid morning on a Thrusday.

i downloaded it because it said it was action...i thought for sure it wasnt gonna be and i was right its not....just another generic tab target....so i uninstalled it right away not for me....and also the character creation....theres like no choice at all yo ucan choose a pre set face...hair....and hair color thats it....really bad..not sure what i expected but thats life
